arts.ttl: Shrewsbury hit back to draw at Blackpool
arts.sum: Rob Apter scored for the home side.

arts.ttl: The best and worst of Shrewsbury Town in 2024 after a turbulent 12 months
arts.sum: In truth, there were other games you could throw into the mix for a low point, the 2-0 loss at home to Barnsley was equally sombre or the defeat to Burton Albion and Walsall, which followed Hurst's departure - they were miserable afternoons to be a Salop fan. Dan Udoh and Chey Dunkley got the goals for Shrews in the second half, and it made Salop fans realise what these players were capable of.

Blackpool are sat bang in the middle of the League One table with the gap to the play-offs currently nine points and the relegation zone eight. The Seasiders did collect a notable point at Birmingham...
